abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Denmark", "MediaType is Image", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Lepidoptera" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 94 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 1 records from Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University Insect Collection 10 records from Lepidoptera Eastern Fennoscandia (Luomus) (LEPFEN) 77491 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 2604 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 28925 records from Species recordings from the Danish National portal Arter.dk 1 records from Entomology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 55 records from Mississippi Entomological Museum 2 records from Entomology Collection at the Natural History Museum of Utah 1 records from eButterfly Surveys 746 records from NHMD Entomology Collection 1 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin Observations 2 records from Earth Guardians Weekly Feed 94 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Lepidoptera 640 records from Lepidoptera World (Luomus) (LEPW)
